body.p: The Board observed that the principle that management commentary should describe management’s view of the financial statements has its roots in regulation. For example, the first of the SEC objectives requires that MD&A:

lq.p: … provide a narrative explanation of a company’s financial statements that enables investors to see the company through the eyes of management. [SEC, Regulation S–K, Item 303]

body.p: That requirement has also been enshrined in securities regulation in Canada and in the UK ASB’s OFR Reporting Statement.
